item.title: ‘Runaway groom’ speeds in stolen Porsche
item.description: A “runaway groom” who made headlines when he skipped bail after his wedding, sparking a massive manhunt, is in trouble again.

item.title: Palmer sues WA premier for defamation
item.description: Billionaire Clive Palmer is officially suing the WA premier for defamation.

item.title: Qld jails in Stage 2 COVID restrictions
item.description: All new inmates to some of Queensland’s major prisons will have to undergo two weeks of isolation when they arrive and personal visitors are no longer welcome under new Stage 2 restrictions.

item.title: Third arrest over SA man’s fatal boat crash
item.description: A third person has been arrested and charged with attempting to pervert the course of justice over a boat crash on the River Murray that killed 37-year-old South Australian man Chad Gill.

item.title: ‘Nothing’ could stop Rebels bikie
item.description: There was “nothing” to stop Rebels sergeant-at-arms Matthew Bruce from heading up a criminal syndicate dealing ice, trafficking military rifles and ordering his cronies to do drive-by shootings.

item.title: Melbourne care home sued over coronavirus death
item.description: The daughter of an elderly man who died of coronavirus is suing the Melbourne aged care home where he spent his last days.

item.title: ‘No-jab no baby bonus’ pitch
item.description: Parents should be subject to a ‘no jab no baby bonus’ scheme that would incentivise them to vaccinate their children and also inject much-needed stimulus into the national economy, an expert says.

item.title: Call for PM to buy Aboriginal flag
item.description: Indigenous advocate and former politician Warren Mundine has called on the Federal Government to buy the copyright to the Aboriginal flag after its use was refused for the AFL Indigenous round this week.

item.title: Lafai in the dark if new Dogs coach wants him
item.description: Off-contract Canterbury centre Tim Lafai hasn’t heard from new coach Trent Barrett, so he plans to use the final six games of the season to impress and secure a new contract.
